note: All figures correspond to [modeled ILO estimates](#dod:ilo-modelled-estimates). Types of jobs are classified by status according to the [ICSE-93 standard](#dod:icse-93). Employment is defined in line with the [13th ICLS](#dod:13-icls) and includes the production of goods for own use, such as subsistence farming.
title: Share of workers in vulnerable employment
subtitle: Share of employed population who are working as independent own-account workers (self-employed without staff), or contributing family workers (self-employed in a household business or farm).
